Invocation Name: shaping influence
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Welcome to Shaping Influence! We are the voice of JMRConnect, an award-winning Influencer Communications, Digital Marketing and Public Relations firm. So, what would you like to do? You can ask questions like, "Why do I need a PR firm?" or "What is Public relations?" or "How do I get my company in the news?" or "How much do PR and Digital Marketing Firms cost?" So, what would you like to know?

This skill was created and is hosted by Witlingo. If you would like your own Q&A voice portal, please email contact@witlingo.com.
